data.name: WIC Ita Expedition
data.desc: WIC send Pieter Adriaenszoon Ita against Sp
data.locn: Cape Tiburon, Cape San Antonio, Dry Tortugas, Havanna
data.agents_sp: Gov Lorenzo de Cabrera, Commander Alvaro de la Cerda 2 Gall
data.agents_nsp0: Pieter Adriaenszoon Ita, CC Jol, Galeyn von Stapels 12 Ships
data.prim_n: Laet [missg] = Laet/Naber 2 34-39 / Add MS 36322 / Wright D 1 pp *103, *105, *107
data.note:
Galeyn von Stapels captains Fortuin with colonists for Tobago cf wiki for Ita /
